description: This file is a CLI script for a project initialization tool, handling argument parsing, project configuration creation, and invoking project setup procedures. It also outputs project template information in JSON format.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration object holding project parameters such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and additional parameters.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Structure containing information needed to initialize a project template, including commands, environment config, init files, and scripts.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for creating project templates and performing the initialization process.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a string of comma-separated key=value pairs into a dictionary with typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on a given base path.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary suitable for JSON serialization, with absolute paths for init files.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs a JSON structure indicating success or failure, along with a message and optional template info.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main execution function that parses arguments, creates configuration, builds the template, and performs project initialization.

ctags.name: output_json

ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
